name: Balance of War
description:
This game was created during the Game Jam HHN2022 within a weekend. 

The theme was:  Keep It Alive.

In this game, tribes fight each other. Your task as a neutral healer is to prevent one tribe from becoming the superpower.

If only one tribe is left, you have failed your mission.

The vision for the game was sadly not fulfilled.

 Superepic by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
